name: Çöl Yük Hayvanı
desc: Sumpter Beasts are friends of humanity. Gentle by nature they serve as important tools of production and transport. Sumpter Beasts can adapt to various different natural environment. Long before the forest merchants ever noticed them, these hardworking animals were already the much-relied-upon domesticated beasts of the desert peoples

customize.name: Çiğ Et
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Kırık Maske
customize.desc:
A broken bone mask that once belonged to some hilichurl.
Now more broken than complete, it can no longer perform its primary function.

customize.name: Lekeli Maske
customize.desc:
A bone mask, covered in unidentifiable stains, that emanates a mysterious odor.
Yet such is the devotion of hilichurls to masks that they will wear it nonetheless.

customize.name: Uğursuz Maske
customize.desc:
A glossy bone mask with oil markings painted on it, meant to intimidate enemies.
No one really knows why hilichurls are so fascinated with masks. Some say that it's because they don't want to see their own reflections in the water.

customize.name: Çiğ Et
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Hazine Avcısı Nişanı
customize.desc: A signet that proudly represents its owner's position as member of the Treasure Hoarders. The pursuit of treasure knows no bounds. That said... Is being a thief something to be proud of?

customize.name: Gümüş Kuzgun Nişanı
customize.desc: A raven insignia used by members of the Treasure Hoarders to identify each other. The Treasure Hoarders ask for no resume. Anyone who has an insatiable desire for treasure and is backed up by an equal amount of courage can become a worthy member.

customize.name: Altın Kuzgun Nişanı
customize.desc: A raven insignia that symbolizes the pride and the guiding principle of the Treasure Hoarders. Whether it's hidden amidst the vastness of the land or in the depths of the seas, as long as there are treasures to be hunted down, the spirit of Treasure Hoarders, who will stop at nothing to acquire them, will never die.

customize.name: Çiğ Et
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Soluk Kırmızı Saten
customize.desc:
A piece of red satin used to cover the eyes. The fabric is slightly torn.

Many Eremites tend to cover their eyes with textiles, but the original intention of this practice has long been lost to the sands of time.

customize.name: İşlemeli Kırmızı İpek
customize.desc:
A piece of red silk trimmed with simple decorations.

A seasoned warrior can detect weaknesses from their foe's eyes and thus take advantage. The Eremites have long since lost a master to serve, and now they have no one to trust but themselves.

Word has it that they are more than convinced that all things betray, even their own eyes.

customize.name: Koyu Kırmızı Sırmalı Kumaş
customize.desc:
A piece of red brocade woven with golden thread.

Those born in the gilded desert under the sun occasionally sing a song, of which the meaning has been forgotten. They would praise the scorching sun that illuminates the earth as equally as ever and bewail the afterglow at the end of the dusk. Some unfamiliar words recur at the end of the song, which are said to be the names of ancient gods. Legend has it that when the King of the Desert was still alive, his people chose to cover their eyes as they dared not look upon him, whose brilliance was beyond that of the sun.

customize.name: Çiğ Et
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Acemi Asker Nişanı
customize.desc: An insignia to identify the recruits. Makes one wonder about what the ones joining the Fatui's war machine were thinking.

customize.name: Subay Nişanı
customize.desc: An insignia to identify officers. The Fatui possess a colossal army, so there must be something extraordinary about the ones who achieved this rank within the group.

customize.name: Çavuş Nişanı
customize.desc: An insignia with a different shape to distinguish the sergeants from new recruits. Perhaps there are complicated emotions behind it.

value.name: Çiğ Et
value.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.
